# Neural Net
Following the guide of the book (online tutorial) 
*Neural Network and Deep Leaning*
I implemented a neural network using Scala.

Some results:

* 1 hidden layer

Layers: 784, 30, 10


* 2 hidden layers

Layers: 784, 100, 30, 10
